member.name: DETAILSINFO
member.summary: Contains detail information for a Shell folder item. Used with the SFVM_GETDETAILSOF notification.

member.name: DETAILSINFO.pidl
member.summary: PIDL of the item whose details are being retrieved.

summary.para: The alignment of the column heading and the subitem text in the column. This member can be one of the following values. Note that the alignment of the leftmost column is always left-justified and cannot be changed.
Header item contains an image in the image list.

member.name: DETAILSINFO.cxChar
member.summary: The number of average-sized characters in the heading.

member.name: DETAILSINFO.str
member.summary: An structure that includes a string containing the requested detail. To convert this structure to a string, use or .

member.name: DETAILSINFO.iImage
member.summary: The index of an icon in the Shell image list that is displayed in the view.
